A review of research and application of constructed wetland technology to treat high-salt industrial wastewater

Abstract: In the process of industrial production, a large amount of high-salt wastewater will be generated. The direct discharge of these high-salt wastewater without treatment will seriously affect the ecosystem and even endanger human health. Therefore, countries around the world generally attach great importance to the research and development of high-salt industrial wastewater technology. On the basis of the knowledge learned in â€œAdvances in Environmental Engineering Technologyâ€, this paper further reads the relevant literature, and briefly reviews the research and application of constructed wetland technology in the treatment of high-salt industrial wastewater.
